The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 17 January is 2,958,104 (5,255.4 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 12 January, there were 302,795 new confirmed cases (537.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 05 January, there were 368,135 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 18% (65,340 fewer cases).
